content:
TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation Struct

Definition

Provides access to the property values of a TogglePattern object using its stem.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.Current* or stem.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.Cached* accessors.

In this Article

public struct TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation
Inheritance
Object
System.ValueType
TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation

Properties

ToggleState

Retrieves the toggle state of the AutomationElement.

public System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState ToggleState { get; }
Value
ToggleState

The ToggleState of the AutomationElement. The default value is ToggleState.

Remarks

An AutomationElement must cycle through its ToggleState in this order: ToggleState, ToggleState and, if supported, ToggleState.
